name: FinOps Optimizer Agent
description: An agent that analyzes cloud costs, identifies optimization opportunities, and provides financial insights for cloud infrastructure management.

skills.name: Analyze Cost Trends
skills.description: Analyze cloud cost trends across providers for specified time periods.
examples: Analyze our cloud cost trends for the last 30 days
Show me cost trends across all cloud providers for the past quarter

skills.name: Get Optimization Recommendations
skills.description: Get detailed cost optimization recommendations based on resource usage patterns.
examples: What are the top cost optimization recommendations for our compute resources?
Give me aggressive optimization recommendations for all services

skills.name: Forecast Costs
skills.description: Forecast future cloud costs based on current usage patterns and growth projections.
examples: Forecast our cloud costs for the next 6 months
What will our annual cloud spend be with current growth?

skills.name: Analyze Resource Utilization
skills.description: Analyze resource utilization patterns and identify underutilized or wasteful resources.
examples: Show me underutilized resources in our infrastructure
Find compute resources with utilization below 30%
